about_the_game:
Elara is a completely free coding game targeted toward beginners. It includes 25+ levels plus optional bonus challenges to really test your knowledge and coding skills. It also features an engaging story told through dialog and animated cutscenes.

The game takes place on Elara, one of Jupiter's moons. You are a coding intern for Ganymede Robotics. Throughout the game, you write code to control a small rover named G.R.O.V.E.R., navigating the lunar surface, avoiding obstacles, and solving puzzles. Kalina, your mentor and fellow Ganymede Robotics engineer, will help you out along the way. Things start out smoothly, but unfortunately your internship doesn't exactly go as planned. It's up to you to fix things! Do you have what it takes to save the day?
detailed_description:
Elara is a completely free coding game targeted toward beginners. It includes 25+ levels plus optional bonus challenges to really test your knowledge and coding skills. It also features an engaging story told through dialog and animated cutscenes.

The game takes place on Elara, one of Jupiter's moons. You are a coding intern for Ganymede Robotics. Throughout the game, you write code to control a small rover named G.R.O.V.E.R., navigating the lunar surface, avoiding obstacles, and solving puzzles. Kalina, your mentor and fellow Ganymede Robotics engineer, will help you out along the way. Things start out smoothly, but unfortunately your internship doesn't exactly go as planned. It's up to you to fix things! Do you have what it takes to save the day?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: Anything from the last 10 years (Intel or Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: No graphics card required
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Look it's a 2D game that is not very demanding at all. If you're reading this, you can probably run the game no problem.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game has a lot of typing so a keyboard strongly recommended.

name: Elara: A Coding Adventure in Space

short_description: Solve puzzles and learn how to code in this unique and gripping sci-fi adventure!
